unnormalised: Hey guys, just a quick tip on understanding your financial docs. Always double-check your IFSC code, like SBIN0001234, when doing online transfers. And remember, your PAN, say ABCDE1234F, is super important for taxes. Also, keep your account number, maybe something like 91234567890, safe and don't share it unnecessarily. Knowing these IDs can save you a lot of hassle later!
normalised: Hey guys, just a quick tip on understanding your financial docs. Always double-check your I-F-S-C code, like S-B-I-N zero zero zero one two three four, when doing online transfers. And remember, your P-A-N, say A-B-C-D-E one two three four F, is super important for taxes. Also, keep your account number, maybe something like nine one two three four five six seven eight nine zero, safe and don't share it unnecessarily. Knowing these I-D's can save you a lot of hassle later!
